data.text: @nickdemarco_ Lucky you I tested positive for 14 days and in bed for 7!!
@nickdemarco_ Glad you’ve fully recovered Nick, now go enjoy the football
@nickdemarco_ Speedy recovery, heading back friday to Newcastle hoping stats clear!

@nickdemarco_ Covid day 3..took to bed at 5.30 with the fever, the aches, the headaches, would it have been worse without 3 jabs?, 2 adult unvaxed kids suffering the same not any worse, Ive clearly been infected and been the spread. Now, they offer me a new guinea pig  antiviral. I think not.
@LisaCoo66880460 Yes - but my guess is from Stansted airport or the flights rather than Prague itself
@nickdemarco_ You catch this after your Prague travels?

@nickdemarco_ Great to hear that you are better again. I still haven’t had it, to my knowledge. It feels like the sword of Damocles is hovering over me. Delighted to hear that you have not been seriously ill. Onwards and upwards for QPR and Newcastle United!
@nickdemarco_ Good man... glad you're on your way to fine fettle. That all clear sign might be the best picture you've posted for a while. Best wishes.
@DanDan04502150 Yes more like flu, worse than cold but to be fair I had worse flu before
@nickdemarco_ After three jabs did it feel like a normal flu? Also, glad you're on the mend and soon to be out with your camera.
